unnormalised: The Sharma family of Jaipur had been saving up for months. Their daughter, Priya, needed a new laptop for her online classes. Mr. Sharma, a government clerk, carefully budgeted, putting aside ₹500 each week. Mrs. Sharma, a school teacher, supplemented this with her small savings from tuitions. They'd decided to wait for the Diwali sale on Flipkart, hoping for a good deal.
normalised: The Sharma family of Jaipur had been saving up for months. Their daughter, Priya, needed a new laptop for her online classes. Mister Sharma, a government clerk, carefully budgeted, putting aside rupee five hundred each week. Missus Sharma, a school teacher, supplemented this with her small savings from tuitions. They'd decided to wait for the Diwali sale on Flipkart, hoping for a good deal.

unnormalised: The sale finally arrived on 20/10/2024. Priya, armed with her father's credit card (limit: Rs. 50000), eagerly browsed through the options. Laptops were advertised with discounts ranging from 10% to 50%. One model, a Lenovo Ideapad, caught her eye – originally priced at ₹45,000, it was now available for ₹35,000 after a discount of Rs. 10000.
normalised: The sale finally arrived on twentieth October two thousand and twenty four. Priya, armed with her father's credit card (limit: rupees fifty thousand), eagerly browsed through the options. Laptops were advertised with discounts ranging from ten percent to fifty percent. One model, a Lenovo Ideapad, caught her eye – originally priced at rupee forty five thousand, it was now available for rupee thirty five thousand after a discount of rupees ten thousand.

unnormalised: However, Priya noticed a small asterisk next to the price. Clicking on it, she discovered that the quoted price didn't include GST (Goods and Services Tax), which would add another 18% to the final amount. Plus, there was a delivery charge of Rs. 250 for shipping to Jaipur. This brought the total cost closer to ₹42,000.
normalised: However, Priya noticed a small asterisk next to the price. Clicking on it, she discovered that the quoted price didn't include G-S-T (Goods and Services Tax), which would add another eighteen percent to the final amount. Plus, there was a delivery charge of rupees two hundred and fifty for shipping to Jaipur. This brought the total cost closer to rupee forty two thousand.

unnormalised: Disappointed but undeterred, Priya searched further. She found another laptop, an HP model, advertised at ₹38,000. This one claimed a "flat 20% off" during the Diwali Dhamaka sale. However, upon closer inspection, she realised the original price listed (Rs. 47500) seemed inflated compared to other websites.
normalised: Disappointed but undeterred, Priya searched further. She found another laptop, an H-P model, advertised at rupee thirty eight thousand. This one claimed a "flat twenty percent off" during the Diwali Dhamaka sale. However, upon closer inspection, she realised the original price listed (rupees forty seven thousand five hundred) seemed inflated compared to other websites.

unnormalised: Adding to the confusion, Flipkart showed a "bank offer" – an instant discount of 5% for transactions made using an ICICI Bank credit card. Mr. Sharma didn't have an ICICI card, only an SBI debit card. Priya considered asking her friend, Rakesh, to use his ICICI card and pay him back later.
normalised: Adding to the confusion, Flipkart showed a "bank offer" – an instant discount of five percent for transactions made using an I-C-I-C-I Bank credit card. Mister Sharma didn't have an I-C-I-C-I card, only an S-B-I debit card. Priya considered asking her friend, Rakesh, to use his I-C-I-C-I card and pay him back later.

unnormalised: Then, there were the countless user reviews. Some praised the laptops, giving them 5 stars and citing excellent performance. Others complained about damaged packaging, delayed delivery, and faulty products. One review mentioned a "scam" where the delivered product didn't match the description.
normalised: Then, there were the countless user reviews. Some praised the laptops, giving them five stars and citing excellent performance. Others complained about damaged packaging, delayed delivery, and faulty products. One review mentioned a "scam" where the delivered product didn't match the description.

unnormalised: After hours of searching, comparing prices, reading reviews, and calculating GST, Priya felt overwhelmed. The online transaction, which had promised convenience, had become a frustrating maze of discounts, taxes, offers, and potential pitfalls. She finally decided to consult her tech-savvy cousin, Anjali, before making a final decision. Maybe, Priya thought, waiting for the Republic Day sale on 26/01/2025 might be a better option after all, even if it meant postponing her online classes for a few more weeks.
normalised: After hours of searching, comparing prices, reading reviews, and calculating G-S-T, Priya felt overwhelmed. The online transaction, which had promised convenience, had become a frustrating maze of discounts, taxes, offers, and potential pitfalls. She finally decided to consult her tech-savvy cousin, Anjali, before making a final decision. Maybe, Priya thought, waiting for the Republic Day sale on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty five might be a better option after all, even if it meant postponing her online classes for a few more weeks.
